relevantArticles.articleAbstractText: 三 设置安装节点的 cloudera-manager yum信息 commonbase机器上： vim /data/apache2/data/htdocs/cloudera-repos/cm6/6.3.1/redhat7/yum/cloudera-manager.repo 将地址修改为http://commonbase.example.com/cloudera-repos [cloudera-manager] name=Cloudera Manager 6.3.1 baseurl=http://commonbase.example.com/cloudera-repos/cm6/6.3.1/redhat7/yum/ gpgkey=http://commonbase.example.com/cloudera-repos/cm6/6.3.1/redhat7/yum/RPM-GPG-KEY-cloudera gpgcheck=1 enabled=1 autorefresh=0 type=rpm-md  [root@commonbase yum]# scp cloudera-manager.re....
